programme.title: Space Channel Universe
programme.desc: Join us as we travel through the Space Channel Universe and experience the Final Frontier like never before. Duration: 5400

programme.title: Sounds of Cinespace
programme.desc: Space and music go so well together.....these Cinespace movies prove our point. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Movies
programme.desc: In Cradle, Eade and her dad are on the return journey to earth when an explosion cripples the craft and seriously injures her father. In New Mars, a generation lives underground on Mars preparing to begin a new life as the colonists of a planet which is being terraformed into a new habitable world. Finally, Kaya Torres is circling a black hole in a pod. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movies
programme.desc: Time and space can get tricky when traveling through time and space. Duration: 3600

programme.title: First Man in Space
programme.desc: The first pilot to leave Earth's atmosphere lands, then suddenly vanishes. Even worse....something with a craving for blood prowls the countryside. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: The Day The Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An Alien lands in Washington D.C. and has a warninf for all mankind. The people of Earth must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Dealers : Money Trouble
programme.desc: In the world of space dealing everyone is having money trouble. Larry gets the offer of a lifetime: a Soviet era space suit. But there’s a problem – the price tag. To be in with a chance he has to clear stock and raise some dough. Torie pays big for an Apollo 11 artefact but it’s not what it seems – has she thrown away $10,000? And Cole meets Apollo 7 legend Walt Cunningham who shares memories of his time in space. Cole has money to spend – what he wants to know is will Walt part with any of his space items? Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Dealers : The Apollo Sale
programme.desc: Torie’s son Jason joins her on the road – she’s introducing him to the family business but will he be more hindrance than help? Larry turns ‘gastronaut’ when he comes across some space food; and a collector’s flash sale sees Cole bid for an Apollo 11 item with an incredible story – how Buzz Aldrin took Holy Communion on the moon. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Captain's Lounge
programme.desc: A journey through space and time to discover the truth in all things, and our connection and rhythm with the Cosmos Duration: 7200
